reviewText: I didn't like It,  all he did was talk loving yourself not exercise. do not buy this dvd and expect exercise
GREAT MODITVATIONAL SPEAKER. I REMEMBER HIS SHOW WHEN I WAS LITTLE. I HAVE ALMOST EVERYTHING HE EVERY MADE EXCEPT THE FULL DEAL A MEAL PROGRAM I CAN NOT FIND ANYWHERE. GREAT DVD TO GET STARTED WITH.

Richard Simmons talks about the six steps he has discovered are the keys to losing weight, and has a guest speaker for each point.  However, as much as I love Richard, there really is so substance, not much helpful information on HOW to acheive these steps.
